narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Whispering Pines is a In Home Supportive Care provider based in Powers, MI. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $11.8M in Medicaid payments across 6K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $11.8M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
